snippet: LEAD: The sudden cancellation of 200 classes at San Francisco State University on Tuesday forced students to wait in registration lines for as long as eight hours for a chance to rearrange their schedules....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: The sudden cancellation of 200 classes at San Francisco State University on Tuesday forced students to wait in registration lines for as long as eight hours for a chance to rearrange their schedules.

headline.main: CAMPUS LIFE: San Francisco State;   Canceling Classes Prompts Lines To Alter Schedules
